reviews.text:
Best Hotel in  Brussels !

We stayed for 3 nights, in our wedding trip. In the room we were waiting for a wonderful view of the European Parliament and a bottle of champagne. I travel a lot, but I have never seen such breakfast, just magnificent. The rooms are clean. After repair, the staff is very amiable. Highly recommend!

Very exclusive Hotel a few hundred meters from the EU parliament. Nice large room with to double beds, and a nice bathroom, but old stile electrical wiring - so No central on/off switch. But, a heat pump for colder times. Breakfast was OK, but I have experienced better.

This was a business trip so had to be near the EU building. The cheap room is open plan, when I say open plan I mean no doors on anything! Sit on the pot, no door, in the shower look at the rest of the room!
The breakfast is fine, did not eat in the restaurant. For the money and what I know now, I would go further out and use the public transport to commute or walk!
Nice enough place.
Certainly not worth €220 a night!

Fantastic location just behind EU Parliament. Great service and lovey staff. Bus stop is just 5 yards away from the hotel door which takes you to the Grand market. I would definitely recommend this hotel to others. Good range of breakfast and hassle free service. They also keep your luggage after the check out which a bonus. More vegetarian options in breakfast would have made me more happy. But over all with three nights stay I am very satisfied with the service I received. If I will be in Brussels next time I will not think twice to book this hotel. Please give me good rates. :) All the staff were super friendly and helpful. Thank you for your hospitality.

Small intimate dining room in the brasserie. Lovely food, excellent portions. As well as  a la carte there are set menu options  not overly expensive considering it's a hotel. Staff were friendly and happily accommodated our party of 8 moving tables and setting up for us quickly.
